statement.p: Write a formula for the volume of a rectangular box, and identify the variables.

solution.p: V=lwh~~. V stands for volume, and l,~w, and h stand for, respectively, the length, width, and height of the box.

statement.p: Write a formula for the average of a number of scores, and identify the variables.

solution.p: A=\dfrac{S}{n}~~. A stands for the average, S stands for the sum of the scores, and n stands for the number of scores.

statement.p:
Choose the correct formula from the list below, and identify the variables.
I=Prt
P=R-C
d=rt
P=rW

ol.label: a
ol.li: The distance traveled at a constant speed.
The simple interest on an investment.
The part specified by a percentage.
The profit on sales of an item.

li.p: d=rt. ~~d stands for the distance traveled at speed r for time t.
I=Prt. ~~I stands for the interest earned on an investment P at interest rate r after a time period t.
P=rW. ~~P stands for the quantity r percent of a whole amount W.
P=R-C. ~~P stands for the profit left after the costs C are subtracted from the revenue R.

statement.p:
Choose the correct geometric formula from the list below, and identify the variables.
A=lw
P=2l+2w
A=\pi r^2
C=\pi d
V=\pi r^2h
V=\dfrac{4}{3}\pi r^3

li.p: V=\pi r^2h. ~~V stands for the volume, r for the radius, and h for the height of the cylinder.
A=\pi r^2. ~~A stands for the area and r for the radius of the circle.
A=lw. ~~A stands for the area of the rectangle, l and w stand for its length and width.
P=2l+2w. ~~P stands for the perimeter of the rectangle, l and w stand for its length and width.
V=\dfrac{4}{3}\pi r^3. ~~V stands for the volume and r for the radius of the sphere.
C=\pi d. ~~C stands for the circumference and d for the diameter of the circle.

statement.p:
Here is a table of values for a function f(x).
x 1 2 5 9 15
f(x) 10 14 22 30 39
Calculate the slopes of the line segments joining each successive pair of points on the graph.
According to your calculations, is the graph concave up or down?

ol.label: a
ol.li: The slopes are decreasing, so the graph is concave down.
